Method.name: IsPackedGet
Method.Description: override IsPacked property to be always returning 1

Method.name: Open
Method.Implementation: #; not try to actually open file set i%FileName = fileName

Method.name: Unpack
Method.Implementation:
set i%FileName = fileName #dim tFileStream As %Stream.FileBinaryGzip = ##class(%Stream.FileBinaryGzip).%New()
set tFileStream.Filename = i%FileName set i%PackageContent = ##class(CPM.Utils.FileBinaryTar).ExtractStreamToArray(tFileStream) kill tFileStream
quit i%PackageContent
